name: Mark and Clippy TMP
description:
Rate the game here : https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/698983

This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Mark and Clippy is a 2D narrative game made with Unity.

Mark Brown finished to establish the list of potential themes for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. He doesn't want to chose the theme today so he tries to save his document. What  should be a simple document backup ends up being a mess. The good old Clippy is here to help him but things get out of control pretty fast.

This game showcase a very simple version of the old Windows environment. You'll end up playing mini-games to help Clippy (Word avatar) to save the day.
